segments.text: Welcome to Flash Foot , sir . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like extra prints made of these photos .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Here they are . I've marked how many prints I want on each shot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What size do you want the prints ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four by six , except this one . I want a ten by thirteen print of this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , they'll be ready for you in an hour .
segments.speaker: S1
